Member asIObjectType::GetSubType () const =0
Since 2.16.0.

Member asIObjectType::IsInterface () const =0
Since 2.16.0. Use (GetFlags() & asOBJ_SCRIPT_OBJECT) && (GetSize() == 0) instead.
